content.text2:
<RichColor Color="0.0196,0.8471,0.0157,1">1. </><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Please make use of our Tribal Wards to manage your base locations and the limit of land you claim per tribe. You will have maximum of 2 totems per tribe at your disposal. Each totem needs to be set at maximum range (50 foundations), this will provide you with the radius for your base. Nobody will be able to build within the totems area, so it is your tribes safe space to build.</>
 <RichColor Color="0.0196,0.8471,0.0157,1">2. </><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Tribes can either use 2 totems together expanding on the main base, or utilise them separately making additional outpost on the map.</>
 <RichColor Color="0.0196,0.8471,0.0157,1">3. </><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Tribes </><RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">MUST NOT</><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1"> build pillars or other buildings within the map, if you making traps, those have to be either picked up after use or left open for others to use.</>
 <RichColor Color="0.0196,0.8471,0.0157,1">4. </><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">You are allowed to build additional teleporters on the map, as long as they are public and kept powered up.</>
 <RichColor Color="0.0196,0.8471,0.0157,1">5. </><RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Admins keep the right to destroy any structures that they deem violating any of our rules.</>
